actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the appointment of a special Senate delegation to host a delegation of members of the Supreme Soviet of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President pro tempore of the Senate to appoint a special delegation of Senators to host a delegation of Members of the Supreme Soviet of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics. Authorizes the expenses of such delegation to be paid from the contingent fund of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the appointment of a special Senate delegation to host a delegation of members of the Supreme Soviet of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, and for other purposes.
